Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay--even if road access isn't the easiest”
Reviews.Author: JustaHoosier
Reviews.Content: jameson exit fine stay travelers cant afford luxury hotel downtown refuse pay average businessperson traveler stay night nice comfortable clean friendly helpful staff affordable price mind rates indy 500 memorial day weekend restaurants cracker barrel mcdonalds fancy easy word hotel hand lane coming interstate access road traffic light

Reviews.Title: “Bad Experience”
Reviews.Author: amblessed
Reviews.Content: wow looking reviews wouldnt lobby clean pretty looking sheets unwashed linen stains sheets makeup pillowcases makeup towels washcloths looked dusted stains carpets disappointing desk clerk friendly apologetic sheet stained looking towel dirty looking clerk towels beds themselves comfortable breakfast morning ice machines ice dont stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “Surprised in a good way!”
Reviews.Author: boiler_mom1968
Reviews.Content: husband visiting family indianapolis didnt arrangements stay drove checking hotels found jameson looking couple unsavory hotels overall happy final choice staff nice beds free breakfast morning usual coffee doughnuts

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel & very cozy!”
Reviews.Author: colleenleopard
Reviews.Content: husband stayed jameson weekend october nice hotel highway 465 close restaurants nice grocery store called marsh street thats 24 hrs hotel staff nice friendly clean cozy complaint housekeeping somehow didnt clean didnt fresh towels day overall recommend hotel family friends traveling indianapolis thank

HotelInfo.Name: Jameson Inn Indy West
HotelInfo.Address: 3850 Eagle View Drive, Indianapolis, IN 46254
